text: wqal kafaar "mk": 'iin natabie alhaqi aladhi jitana bh, wntbra min alawlya' walalht, nutakhattaf min 'ardina balqtl walasr wnhb alamwal, 'awalam najealahum mtmknyn fi balad amn, hrramna ealaa alnaas safk aldima' fyh, yujlb 'iilayh thamarat kuli shay' rzqana min ldna? wlkn 'akthar hwla' almushrikin la yaelamun qadr hadhih alnaeam elyhm, fyshkru man 'aneam ealayhim biha wytyewh
